root.name: Art Style: KUBOS
root.description: The objective of the game is to stay alive in an area of falling blocks, while at the same time manipulating those same blocks to form complete floors of a tower in order to score points and make more room for you to move around freely and avoid being squished. Â The game has two modes of play: TEN FLOORS, in which you play through 10 short floors in an effort to achieve the best score, and TOWER, in which you see how high you can climb before dying.
